# groups

Manage groups

## Usage

```console
coder groups
```

## Subcommands

| Name                                   | Purpose             |
| -------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| [<code>create</code>](./groups_create) | Create a user group |
| [<code>list</code>](./groups_list)     | List user groups    |
| [<code>edit</code>](./groups_edit)     | Edit a user group   |
| [<code>delete</code>](./groups_delete) | Delete a user group |
